title: Ranked flex team and possible duo for ranked!
body:
Hi i'm currently a s3/s2 playing in solo q, I am currently looking for a support main around s3/s2 as i main adc or some role that can potentially synergize well with adc. I am open to suggestions. I am mostly interested for a regular active team in ranked flex, I would like to main mid, top would be my secondary in ranked flex, so any of the other roles would be good such as jg, adc, support and top. I am looking for ranked flex players that are around mid silver/high bronze.

My IGNs are: HaboNewWorld ; TheWillofNoriaki 

Hit me up here first providing me info about your rank, roles you play (the crucial details) and your IGN. 
Then I'll hit you up on the rift! :D

Note: I play on OCE because I am from Australia.

replies.body:
Hey, I'm down to play if you are, I'm bronze 1 in flexed but Gold 4 in Solo queue, I am a support main 

Thanks,
DramaticChicken
Cool i'll pop through a friend request, hope we can play soon! :)
hi im mobslayer557 in game and im silver 5 I usually play mid or jg and id love to play some league with u im also 15 if u wanted to know and a male xD
Hi dude, that's totally fine dude. Are you on OCE server? I should have pointed that out haha. I play on OCE cos I'm from Oz.
I'm G4 soloq, but i'd like to rank up flex. I play a good Zyra/Soraka support lane, used to main adc, and am slowly picking up jg as well. IGN Astaraela.
Hey dude that sounds good. I would definitely be down to playing some ranked flex games. I'll leave solo Q to you, you wouldn't want to duo with me xd. I'll add you now.
